persona.quote: Uh, I'm bi-winning. I win here, I win there.
Winner winner chicken dinner? I don't think so. Winner-winner SHEEN dinner!
I am on a drug. It's called Charlie Sheen. It's not available. If you try it once, you will die.
I was bangin' seven-gram rocks and finishing them because that's how I roll.
I have one speed, one gear: GO!
I have a different constitution. I have a different brain; I have a different heart; I got tiger blood, man
I'm sorry, man, but I've got magic. I've got poetry in my fingertips.
Most of the time - and this includes naps - I'm an F-18, bro. And I will destroy you in the air. I will deploy my ordinance to the ground.
You borrow my brain for 5 seconds and just be like, 'Dude! Can't handle it! Unplug this bastard!' Yeah.
All we do is put wins in the record books.
We win so radically in our underwear before our first cup of coffee, it's scary.
I mean, what's not to love? Especially when you see how I party man, it's epic.
The run I was on made Sinatra, Flynn, Jagger, Richards, all of them, just look like droopy-eyed, armless children.
I'm tired of pretending I'm not a total bitchin' rock star from Mars.
You can't process me with a normal brain.
I am battle-tested bayonets, bro.
I'm not Thomas Jefferson. He was a pussy.
Winning.
C'mon bro, I won best picture at 20. I wasn't even trying. I wasn't even warm.
You have the right to kill me, but you do not have the right to judge me. Boom. That's the whole movie. That's life.
My body is a lock box of diamonds, uranium, and assassin nobility
Warning: The taste of Charlie Sheen has the ability to make your soul weep, and forfeit.
I'm living the life of a rockstar vatican assassin.
Winning, anyone? Rhymes with winning. Anyone? Yeah, that would be us. Sorry, man, didn't make the rules. Oops!
I am battle-tested bayonets, bro.
The only thing I'm addicted to right now is winning.
Like a Dinosaur Stampede from middle earth RAGING atop Col. Kilgore's main rotor, our assault must be EPIC.
It's been a tsunami of media and I've been riding it on a mercury surfboard.
We work for the pope, we murder people. We're Vatican assassins. How complicated can it be?
What they're not ready for is guys like you and I and Nails and all the other gnarly gnarlingtons in my life
We are high priests, Vatican assassin warlocks. Boom. Print that, people.
I blinked and I cured my brain.
I'm grandiose. Because I live a grandiose life. I'm not aw shucks.. because I'm gnarly.
I'm celebrating me, every day.
I'm sober down to my Adonis DNA.
the title of my book has finally been delivered thru vast and extensive Lunar channels. "Apocalypse Me" Warlock Latin for WINNING.
psst, check it, you've been warned. #SheensKorner violent torpedo of truth. love or hate. do the math.
fastball. the trolls are foaming from their toothless holes. rumor mill abundant with evil gossip. mainstream heretics smirking.
Look what I'm dealing with, man, I'm dealing with fools and trolls.
Oh wait, can't process it. Losers. Winning. Buh bye.
Boom, crush. Night, losers. Winning, duh.
I have defeated this earthworm with my words. Imagine what I would have done with my fire breathing fists.
There's a storm coming - and it's me.
And for those that are not onboard, it's like, 'Catch ya in the rearview, losers.'
This Warlock is in the breach. Poised. T-minus 51 mins. read my tigerblood dripping lips; you've been warned.
I live inside the truth, and you cannot debate me.
Dying is for fools, amateurs.
I'm not fair game. I'm not a soft target. It's over. There's a new sheriff in town. And he has an army of assassins.
Can't is the cancer of happening.
